blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: theoldbranding
blog.title: the courage to exist
blog.description: miru / 23 / germany • mostly shitposts. sometimes I make gifs. (following from @firetotheproof) • they/them

summary: how about we stop being harsh to the people that have their opinion and feelings about the current dan/dnp situation instead of...
body: how about we stop being harsh to the people that have their opinion and feelings about the current dan/dnp situation instead of calling them overdramatic and demanding bc each feeling is valid and you don’t get to tell people how to feel about certain things bc that’s the consequence of a situation like this: people feel a certain way. so let them.

reblog.comment: how about we stop being harsh to the people that have their opinion and feelings about the current dan/dnp situation instead of calling them overdramatic and demanding bc each feeling is valid and you don’t get to tell people how to feel about certain things bc that’s the consequence of a situation like this: people feel a certain way. so let them.

trail.content: how about we stop being harsh to the people that have their opinion and feelings about the current dan/dnp situation instead of calling them overdramatic and demanding bc each feeling is valid and you don’t get to tell people how to feel about certain things bc that’s the consequence of a situation like this: people feel a certain way. so let them.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Do you agree with the following statment? Phil is better than Dan at managing his own mind, emotions, thoughts, and feelings.
question: Do you agree with the following statment? Phil is better than Dan at managing his own mind, emotions, thoughts, and feelings.
answer: No, I don’t agree actually. They are very different people and have different strengths and weaknesses, but I wouldn’t say one way is inherently better than the other. Phil is much better at compartmentalizing, whereas Dan tends to let things consume him, and I think that’s why it might seem like he is better at managing his mind and emotions than Dan, but he is also not very comfortable sharing anything that isn’t positive and agreeable and isn’t able to push himself out of his comfort zone or give up control nearly as easily as Dan. Phil tends to avoid “negative” emotions, whereas Dan tends to lean into them. One example of this is Phil saying that he was too sensitive to watch The Handmaid’s Tale. The show is pretty harrowing, but it’s no more violent or graphic sexually than Game of Thrones, which he loves. The reason The Handmaid’s Tale is uncomfortable to watch at times is because it forces us to confront things about our own society and where we could end up if they are allowed to go unchecked. I actually think their philosophies when it comes to playing video games, as seen on the gaming channel, demonstrate their differences pretty well. When a game is difficult and frustrating, Phils reaction more often than not seems to be to give up and move onto something else, whereas Dan tends to get more determined and committed. Dan’s philosophy is more likely to lead to progress and achievement, but also more likely to drive him crazy in the process. I don’t think either way is better, just different.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Fics Written In 2015 Masterlist
body:
36 Questions (ao3) - nokomisfics

Summary: Dan’s looking at him with that glint in his eye, that it’s-four-AM-I-am-the-opposite-of-sober-right-now look that Phil hasn’t seen in a while, and Dan hasn’t even suggested anything yet but he already knows he’s screwed.

Baby, I’m Crazy For You - cocktailaunt

Summary: High School AU: Badyboy!Phil and shy!Dan broke up a few months ago and now Phil is trying to win him back.

Blue - washedoutgay

Summary: Dan is an artist who sees people as colours and Phil needs money.

but home is just a room (full of my safest sounds) (ao3) - blueshirt

Summary: In which things fall apart, and then back together.

But It Takes Someone To Come Around To Show You How (ao3) Phantastically

Summary: Dan is born mute into a world where once in everyone’s life your soulmate will say the specific words that are tattooed onto your body, and bring you together. These words will save your life in more ways than imaginable. Whilst Dan resigns himself to the fact he will never have a soulmate, fate has different ideas…

Cloud Watch (ao3) - howelllesters

Summary: I asked for people to leave words in my askbox so I could write a mini phanfic. existentiall-crisiss didn’t play fairly, and left me ‘clouds’. Or, pastel!Dan hates his new journal but writes in it anyway, and accidentally just ends up recording his feelings on punk!Phil, in a suitably melodramatic way.

Dangerous Game - phancywork, pasteldanhowells

Summary: Howell’s School of Abilities is a prestigious facility for children and teenagers with special powers. Dan and Phil both attend the school, but coming from rivaling families with opposing powers, they’re not exactly friends - their relationship is rather build on hostility and hatred. But what is going to happen to them when their final exam forces them to spend a week alone together?

Details Of An Asteroid - dantiloquent

Summary: When Dan and Phil keep bumping into each other, they eventually give in to chance and start talking. Soon enough, Dan makes a home at the library Phil works at, and they talk about nothing and everything so often that there is no going back. The two survive the future just fine, until they learn the flaws of leaning the weight of your existence on someone else’s shoulders.

from the sky to the centre (ao3) - 87lester

Summary: Being a Guardian angel has never been simple, and up until now Phil has handled it as well as he can. But a close call with death threatens both Phil and his human’s existence, and Phil very quickly learns what sacrificing yourself for another truly entails.

I’ve Got High Hopes (for Me and You) - cafephan

Summary: It’s Dan and Phil’s wedding day, and they’ve written their own vows. After not having seen each other for days prior, every word is that much more sincere.

Jokes, Costumes, and Taxi Fares - placingglaciers

Summary: In which all his coworkers just adore Phil and Dan can’t see why they do. Until, of course, he figures it out.

Kinsey Two - thatsmistertoyou

Summary: The Kinsey scale, also called the Heterosexual–Homosexual Rating Scale, attempts to describe a person’s sexual experience or response at a given time.

litany in which certain things are crossed out (ao3) - nokomisfics, recklessfishes

Summary: Dan has a List, and he has a dingy flat with a broken heater, and a bunch of papers with half-formed ideas on them. And then one day, he has a Phil. Inspired by Litany in which Certain Things are Crossed Out (poem) by Richard Siken.

Our Threadbare Lies (ao3) - ramonaspeaks

Summary: Dan is eighteen years old and newly single. He’s ready to come out to his family but he thinks it would be a hell of a lot easier if he had a boyfriend to help him through it.

Read It And Weep - phansomedevil

Summary: Dan’s feelings toward Phil are nothing but platonic, or so he thinks before stumbling upon some actually decent phanfiction and falling face-first into the abyss.

Smoke and Flowers - finnreyofficial

Summary: high school!/teenage! phan au in which Phil tends to the flowers and plants in the greenhouse behind his school and eventually finds himself completely smitten with the boy who sometimes smokes outside his door–Dan Howell.

Stacking The Odds Against Failed Beginnings - lovebuglester

Summary: Two childhood friends with false starts to their name try to find their niche in the world.

Teaching Phil to Enjoy Sex - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan and Phil have been dating for 6 months, but they haven’t gone much further than making out, as Phil’s a virgin. Despite Dan’s sexual frustration, its Phil who eventually grows frustrated at their lack of sex life.Deciding to take matters into his own hands to get over his fears, Phil tries to force them into getting over this hump in their relationship using a butt plug. Things go horribly wrong –or horribly right?

The Colour Thieves - lestericalphan

Summary: “I’m Phil, that’s Dodie, and that’s PJ. And if you haven’t guessed by now, we are Colour Thieves”

The Government has banned colour, creativity, and homosexuality in Braith, the Black and White City, in order to provide only the necessary requirements for life, but some escape the confines of the city to become Colour Thieves, vowing to return the world to the way it ought to be. Dan, a perfectly normal citizen, gets kidnapped by a band of Thieves, stealing him away from all he knows for unknown reasons. But will they change Dan’s way of thinking or just scare him away?

The End Of Paralysis (ao3) - dandrogynous

Summary: the one where Phil gets drafted and Dan gets left behind.

There is a Light That Never Goes Out - botanistlester

Summary: When Dan Howell goes to end his life one night, he doesn’t expect to find a stranger who proposes a deal. If Dan gives him thirty days, Phil will give him thirty reasons to live. If at the end of the month and Dan still feels the same, then Phil will leave him alone.

You Smiled The Whole Way Through It (I Guess Maybe That’s What’s Worse) (ao3) - starrywrite

Summary: The one where Dan and Phil meet for the first time but it doesn’t go as planned.

reblog.comment:
36 Questions (ao3) - nokomisfics

Summary: Dan’s looking at him with that glint in his eye, that it’s-four-AM-I-am-the-opposite-of-sober-right-now look that Phil hasn’t seen in a while, and Dan hasn’t even suggested anything yet but he already knows he’s screwed.

but home is just a room (full of my safest sounds) (ao3) - blueshirt

Summary: In which things fall apart, and then back together.

But It Takes Someone To Come Around To Show You How (ao3) Phantastically

Summary: Dan is born mute into a world where once in everyone’s life your soulmate will say the specific words that are tattooed onto your body, and bring you together. These words will save your life in more ways than imaginable. Whilst Dan resigns himself to the fact he will never have a soulmate, fate has different ideas…

Cloud Watch (ao3) - howelllesters

Summary: I asked for people to leave words in my askbox so I could write a mini phanfic. existentiall-crisiss didn’t play fairly, and left me ‘clouds’. Or, pastel!Dan hates his new journal but writes in it anyway, and accidentally just ends up recording his feelings on punk!Phil, in a suitably melodramatic way.

Dangerous Game - phancywork, pasteldanhowells

Summary: Howell’s School of Abilities is a prestigious facility for children and teenagers with special powers. Dan and Phil both attend the school, but coming from rivaling families with opposing powers, they’re not exactly friends - their relationship is rather build on hostility and hatred. But what is going to happen to them when their final exam forces them to spend a week alone together?

Details Of An Asteroid - dantiloquent

Summary: When Dan and Phil keep bumping into each other, they eventually give in to chance and start talking. Soon enough, Dan makes a home at the library Phil works at, and they talk about nothing and everything so often that there is no going back. The two survive the future just fine, until they learn the flaws of leaning the weight of your existence on someone else’s shoulders.

from the sky to the centre (ao3) - 87lester

Summary: Being a Guardian angel has never been simple, and up until now Phil has handled it as well as he can. But a close call with death threatens both Phil and his human’s existence, and Phil very quickly learns what sacrificing yourself for another truly entails.

I’ve Got High Hopes (for Me and You) - cafephan

Summary: It’s Dan and Phil’s wedding day, and they’ve written their own vows. After not having seen each other for days prior, every word is that much more sincere.

Jokes, Costumes, and Taxi Fares - placingglaciers

Summary: In which all his coworkers just adore Phil and Dan can’t see why they do. Until, of course, he figures it out.

Kinsey Two - thatsmistertoyou

Summary: The Kinsey scale, also called the Heterosexual–Homosexual Rating Scale, attempts to describe a person’s sexual experience or response at a given time.

litany in which certain things are crossed out (ao3) - nokomisfics, recklessfishes

Summary: Dan has a List, and he has a dingy flat with a broken heater, and a bunch of papers with half-formed ideas on them. And then one day, he has a Phil. Inspired by Litany in which Certain Things are Crossed Out (poem) by Richard Siken.

Our Threadbare Lies (ao3) - ramonaspeaks

Summary: Dan is eighteen years old and newly single. He’s ready to come out to his family but he thinks it would be a hell of a lot easier if he had a boyfriend to help him through it.

Read It And Weep - phansomedevil

Summary: Dan’s feelings toward Phil are nothing but platonic, or so he thinks before stumbling upon some actually decent phanfiction and falling face-first into the abyss.

Smoke and Flowers - finnreyofficial

Summary: high school!/teenage! phan au in which Phil tends to the flowers and plants in the greenhouse behind his school and eventually finds himself completely smitten with the boy who sometimes smokes outside his door–Dan Howell.

Stacking The Odds Against Failed Beginnings - lovebuglester

Summary: Two childhood friends with false starts to their name try to find their niche in the world.

Teaching Phil to Enjoy Sex - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan and Phil have been dating for 6 months, but they haven’t gone much further than making out, as Phil’s a virgin. Despite Dan’s sexual frustration, its Phil who eventually grows frustrated at their lack of sex life.Deciding to take matters into his own hands to get over his fears, Phil tries to force them into getting over this hump in their relationship using a butt plug. Things go horribly wrong –or horribly right?

The Colour Thieves - lestericalphan

Summary: “I’m Phil, that’s Dodie, and that’s PJ. And if you haven’t guessed by now, we are Colour Thieves”

The Government has banned colour, creativity, and homosexuality in Braith, the Black and White City, in order to provide only the necessary requirements for life, but some escape the confines of the city to become Colour Thieves, vowing to return the world to the way it ought to be. Dan, a perfectly normal citizen, gets kidnapped by a band of Thieves, stealing him away from all he knows for unknown reasons. But will they change Dan’s way of thinking or just scare him away?

The End Of Paralysis (ao3) - dandrogynous

Summary: the one where Phil gets drafted and Dan gets left behind.

There is a Light That Never Goes Out - botanistlester

Summary: When Dan Howell goes to end his life one night, he doesn’t expect to find a stranger who proposes a deal. If Dan gives him thirty days, Phil will give him thirty reasons to live. If at the end of the month and Dan still feels the same, then Phil will leave him alone.

You Smiled The Whole Way Through It (I Guess Maybe That’s What’s Worse) (ao3) - starrywrite

Summary: The one where Dan and Phil meet for the first time but it doesn’t go as planned.

trail.content_raw:
36 Questions (ao3) - nokomisfics

Summary: Dan’s looking at him with that glint in his eye, that it’s-four-AM-I-am-the-opposite-of-sober-right-now look that Phil hasn’t seen in a while, and Dan hasn’t even suggested anything yet but he already knows he’s screwed.

Baby, I’m Crazy For You - cocktailaunt

Summary: High School AU: Badyboy!Phil and shy!Dan broke up a few months ago and now Phil is trying to win him back.

Blue - washedoutgay

Summary: Dan is an artist who sees people as colours and Phil needs money.

but home is just a room (full of my safest sounds) (ao3) - blueshirt

Summary: In which things fall apart, and then back together.

But It Takes Someone To Come Around To Show You How (ao3) Phantastically

blog.name: phandomwatch
blog.title: Phandom Watch Fest
blog.description:
Get your seats comfy and your snacks ready as we explore the wonderful world of Dan & Phil! 
Interested? Visit our "Show Info" page to know how we do it or follow us on twitter for more updates!

blog.name: ao3feedphan
blog.title: ao3feed-phan
blog.description: RSS feed of Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on ao3

title: wash over me
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OnKrRx

by dizzy

Sometimes the storm does strange things; timestamp set while Dan and Phil are still in England surviving.

Words: 1469, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 7 of in the half light

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OnKrRx
